## Core Blocks in NMODL

## NEURON BLOCK

Declares mechanism properties and interface variables:

::: {.callout-note icon="false"}
## NEURON BLOCK

NEURON

{ SUFFIX CaT : Mechanism name

USEION ca READ cai, cao WRITE ica

RANGE gbar, minf : Global and range variables

GLOBAL tau_m

}
:::
